Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, AMPHIBIAN, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (86.96%) toMagainin IIA: 22%; F: 13%, K: 17%.Activity: Active against fungi C. parasitica (MIC 10 uM), F. oxysporum (MIC 15 uM), and S. musiva (MIC 5 uM), plant pathogenic bacteria A. tumefaciens (MIC 100 uM), E.amylovora (MIC 250 uM), and P.syringae (MIC 250 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Powell WA, Catranis CM, Maynard CA. 1995
Literature Information.Reference: Mol Plant Microbe Interact. 1995 Sep-Oct;8(5):792-4. doi: 10.1094/mpmi-8-0792.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Synthetic antimicrobial peptide design
